name: Dual Racer (itch)
description:
The HTML5 version seems to resize the window which breaks multiple things.
Please play the downloadable Windows version if you are able to.

This is my first time participating in a game jam.
The theme this year is "Joined Together" so I tried multiple ideas surrounding a barebones top-down racing game.
The idea that ended-up working the best was having two vehicles to control the direction of at the same time but with separate acceleration pedals.

The two ideas that didn't make it :
- Having no wheel, but the speed-o-meter steers, meaning you turn left if you go slow and right if you go fast.
- Having a lawnmower tied to the vehicle and having to drift so that it goes off-course to cut the grass outside of the circuit.

I had fun while making this game and I'm glad I had time to test or implement most of the ideas I had.

Try and beat my time: 52 seconds!
Thanks for reading and playing!
